front.title: Security Extension for Unidirectional Lightweight Encapsulation Protocol

abstract.t: This document describes the header extension for Unidirectional Encapsulation Protocol (ULE) that secures the IP traffic transported using ULE to provide security features like data confidentiality, data integrity, data origin authentication and mechanisms to prevent replay attacks. The format of the header extension and processing at the Receiver and Transmitter are described in detail.
